text: Hey everyone :wave: We’re working on some integrations with the Templates API but some clients don’t have Website Pages enabled. Is there a way to check what HubSpot Plan or Features someone has available?

Thanks <@U012W4YEUTX> I ended up using an old markdown trick of mine using extra trailing whitespace to trigger a newline:
`Hi Matt,`  
`How are you today?`  
`From,`  
`Morgan`
